text:
Joseph Antonio Cartagena (born August 19, 1970), better known as Fat Joe, is an American rapper and actor. He started his music career as a member of the hip hop band Diggin' in the Crates Crew. He later began a solo career.
One of Fat Joe's many famous songs includes "What's Luv" with Ja Rule and Ashanti. He also rapped "All the Way Up" with Remy Ma.
Fat Joe was in the movies "Happy Feet" (2006), "Scary Movie 3" and Spike Lee's Netflix series "She's Gotta Have It".
Fat Joe was born in the Bronx, New York City.
